page.title: 11TOURISM IN ALFRISTON
page.content: To the south of the village are residential hotels, Deans Place and Riverdale, together with Deans Barn and Pleasant Rise, who all provide accommodation to visitors wishing to walk the Downs. There are two riding stables, one in Smuggler's Close and one near Winton Street to the north of the village. There is also a sports centre providing facilities for indoor tennis, net practice for cricketers in the winter, and badminton. The Savages who own this land have 100 acres extending up France Bottom which they let out for grazing. They are making a collection of old Sussex Farm carts and machinery.
